vote.title: Authorize partial settlement of the consolidated lawsuit styled Ahmed Ahmed v. City of Dallas v. Ahmed Ahmed and Brinks Incorporated consolidated with Jose Penas v. City of Dallas, Cause No. DC-22-00009 - Not to exceed $150,000.00 for the settlement of Ahmed Ahmed’s claims and $30,000.00 for the settlement of Jose Penas’s claims - Financing:  Liability Reserve Fund
